sys_script_include.description: Get regions from Mining Companies table.

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_114009_meg_leg_0.GetRegions</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Get regions from Mining Companies table.</description><name>GetRegions</name><script><![CDATA[var GetRegions = Class.create();
// Extend the global.AbstractAjaxProcessor class
GetRegions.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor,{
  // Define the getEmail function.  
  // Create a GlideRecord for the User table.
  // Use the sysparm_userID passed from the client side to retrieve a record from the User table.
  // Return the email address for the requested record
  getEmail: function() {
    var userRecord = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
    userRecord.get(this.getParameter('sysparm_userID'));
    return userRecord.email + '';
  },
  type: 'GetRegions'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-09-23 18:37:45</sys_created_on><sys_id>dee9945097adf5104868bf1e6253af85</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetRegions</sys_name><sys_package display_value="MEG Legal advice" source="x_114009_meg_leg_0">4de7e74097a9f5104868bf1e6253afd5</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="MEG Legal advice">4de7e74097a9f5104868bf1e6253afd5</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_dee9945097adf5104868bf1e6253af85</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-09-23 19:51:13</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
